param.name: account
param.description: List resources by account. Must be used with the domainId parameter.

param.name: accounttype
param.description: list users by user type. Valid user types are 1 (admin), 2 (domain-admin), and 0 (user).

param.name: domainid
param.description: list all users in specified domain.

param.name: isrecursive
param.description: defaults to false, but if true, lists all users from the parent specified by the domain id till leaves.

param.name: listall
param.description: If set to false, list only resources belonging to the command's caller; if set to true - list resources that the caller is authorized to see. Default value is false

param.name: state
param.description: list users by state. Valid states are enabled, disabled, and locked.

response.name: account
response.description: the account name of the user

response.name: accountid
response.description: the account ID of the user

response.name: accounttype
response.description: the account type of the user

response.name: apikey
response.description: the api key of the user

response.name: created
response.description: the date and time the user user was created

response.name: domain
response.description: the domain name of the user

response.name: domainid
response.description: the domain ID of the user

response.name: secretkey
response.description: the secret key of the user

response.name: timezone
response.description: the timezone user was created in
